alert.note: Alert for Denton; Tarrant (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 10 at 4:28PM CDT by NWS Dallas-Fort Worth
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southwestern Denton and northern Tarrant Counties through 500 PM CDT... At 427 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Roanoke, or near Trophy Club, moving southwest at 10 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts of 50 to 55 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Fort Worth, Arlington, Flower Mound, Euless, Bedford, Grapevine, Haltom City, Keller, Hurst, Southlake, Watauga, Colleyville, Saginaw, Trophy Club, Richland Hills, Eagle Mountain, North Richland Hills, Roanoke, Pecan Acres and Justin. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...55 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
